      • isWebElementDisplayed

        public static boolean isWebElementDisplayed(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element,
                                            boolean... waitForElement)
         Method to check if element exists on the page and is displayed
        Parameters:
        element - - WebElement object which is to be check for
        waitForElement - - true if user wants to wait for the element before checking if it is displayed. false otherwise
        Returns:
        boolean - true if element is displayed on the page. false otherwise

        Parameters:

                                                java.lang.Object pageClassObj,

                                         throws java.lang.Exception
         Method to set text to specified text box element.
 Returns value of Value attribute after setting provided text.
 Returns empty string if unable to set text.

        pageObjectClass - - Object of the Page class
        valueToSet - - Value/String to be set
        Returns:

      • VerifyText

        public static boolean VerifyText(java.lang.String inExpectedText,
                                 java.lang.String inActualText,
                                 boolean... ignoreCase)
         Method to verify two strings. 
 Method also takes care of reporting the result into the log file.
 Trims off white spaces at both the ends.
 If opted ignores case while comparing.
        Parameters:
        inExpectedText -
        inActualText -
        ignoreCase - - true or false 
         Pass true to ignore case while comparing. 
        Takes default value if this argument is vomited. 
        Default value: false
        Returns:
        - boolean - true if both the string matches. false otherwise

      • VerifyPartialText

        public static boolean VerifyPartialText(java.lang.String inPartialText,
                                        java.lang.String inActualText,
                                        boolean ignoreCase)
         Method to verify partial text of two strings. 
 Trims off white spaces at both the ends.
        Parameters:
        inPartialText -
        inActualText -
        ignoreCase -
        Returns:
        - boolean - true if both the string matches. false otherwise

      • getIntegerCurrency

        public static float getIntegerCurrency(java.lang.String curValue)
         Method to convert amount displayed as String with $ symbol and returns a float value.
 If opted ignores case while comparing.
        Parameters:
        curValue - - a String value - the value that is read from the application eg "$12,123.50"
        Returns:
        - float

      • captureScreenshot

        public static java.lang.String captureScreenshot()
         Method to capture screenshots from active window handle
 Files are placed under folder named specific to test case
 Base folder location is provided in property "ScreenshotFolder" 
 File name:
        < TestCaseName>_I< IterationNumber>_< TotalNumberOfFilesInFolder>.png
 Example:
        MyTestCase_I1_6.png
        Returns:
        String  Returns screenshot file name with path
